articles.title: Rare Covid symptom that affects penis size as sufferer claims he's lost an INCH - The Mirror
articles.description: A bigger-than-average fella from America was riding high until he took some Covid in the peen - now he's less equipped than he was and is understandably devastated
articles.content:
Talk of Covid symptoms are everywhere, with each one more wild than the last, but this truly is a standout - a man claims his penis has shrunk due to the virus.

articles.title: Face shields, plexiglass barriers 'a waste of money' in Covid-19 battle: US aerosol expert - The Star Online
articles.description: MANILA (Philippine Daily Inquirer/Asia News Network): Instead of face shields and plexiglass barriers, the Philippines should rely more on protective masks and proper ventilation, and even going outdoors, an American aerosol expert said.
